lead_paragraph: Russia's economic difficulties will not affect the country's preparations to host the 2018 World Cup, FIFA President Gianni Infantino said on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Russia World Cup Safe From Economic Threat-Infantino
headline.main: Russia World Cup Safe From Economic Threat-Infantino

snippet: Russia's economic difficulties will not affect the country's preparations to host the 2018 World Cup, FIFA President Gianni Infantino said on Wednesday....
